version_description:
Fixed background stall problem.
Added IAP item.
GPS recording, playback, GPX exporter.

Fixed background stall problem.
Added IAP item.
GPS recording, playback, GPX exporter.

All program code update.
Client app LOCAMO connect to automatically.
Add next cross platform code for next version.
App price changed basic charge free.
Add new full core location recording functions.
Add functions share recorded location by server.
For developer: You can test this version load location information by json format. http://IP_ADDRESS:12345/TexaGPS/result.json
